page.title: 07SOCIAL LIFE AND HOBBIES.
page.content: Stainton and Thornton are dormitory villages,senior citizens visit the local halls for their enjoyment and christian fellowship.Thornhill residents ,who live near a community centre where entertainment is sought,travel like the villagers to town for theatre and dances,swimming and town pubs.Most people leave their homely hobbies,gardening,sewing,watching T.V.playing games,annually for holidays.Children enjoy horse riding,collecting stamps etc.,giving young and old pleasure. Sports and Public Houses are firm social pastimes.Walking the dog and reading are favourite hobbies in village and suburb.Other hobbies include keep fit,crosswords,cookery,painting,D.I.Y. making wines/beers,listening to music and jogging.
